reviewText:
quite informative, I was expecting more of a movie type recoreding which it is not. It is more on the order of taking a class, but it was very informative. Worth buying.
thanks
This isn't one of the best one's I've seen. But it was pretty informative...if you believe in this type of thing!
very interesting in its content and presentation, however why not as science advances we cannot ignore the possibility I am in favor of the idea.
Wasn't as interesting as I thought it would be. Maybe because I have heard most of this info before.

I thought this would fun to watch.  This DVD is some guy giving a lecture. There is a small amount of ancient history and a HUGE amount of speculation.  For entertainment, get a copy of Ancient Aliens or an old X-Files DVD.  Unless you are a true believer in UFO's, this is not for you.

I was disappointed with this DVD but, I'm not part of the target audience. The entertainment factor is low. Imagine being in a classroom and a professor of ufology is giving a lecture, that is this DVD.  If that is what you want, then this DVD deserves five stars.  If you want a fun si-fi movie to watch while having pizza and beer, one star.
